turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you do me a favor and pick up a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, boss. Which location would you like me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The address is 30065 Alicia Pkwy, Laguna Niguel, CA 92677

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it! What did you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I've been craving a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's a bit hot out today. You want a cold one, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh that's right! Yeah, make it an iced caramel macchiato please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You bet! What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Go with a medium, or whatever they call it there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande? Sure thing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm ordering from the website now. I forgot to ask if you have any milk preference.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, right. I'm trying to avoid dairy. Soy milk I suppose, or almond milk if they have it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me find out for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do indeed have almond milk!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! So that'll be a grande iced caramel macchiato with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Indeed! I'm ordering it now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: By the way, did you want me to order any food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you. The wife made me a big breakfast this morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. Just ordered your beverage and will have a digital receipt texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, sir. I'm on my way to pick up your drink and will see you at the office.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You bet!
